Summary: Similar to the Close Encounters shape. Fewer lights. High up.
divs: sighting detailsi came home from work late. i always love to look at the pond with the moonlight shining on it and after the crap day i'd had, i was doubly happy to see something that didn't cost anything and didn't want a piece of my time. as i was looking at the sky and smiling, i saw the ufo overing over the trees\pond next to my house. it seemed to be high up in the air and it was a very large looking craft. there were a few clouds and the moonlight seemed to bounce off the clouds and outline the craft. it wasn't close to the shape of an airplane or anything i've seen before. i watched it for about 20 seconds and it moved slowly upward and off to the west. it went over the trees, gaining speed and suddenly zipped away. i thought it was pretty neat. i didn't feel out of the ordinary when it left or since seeing it.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Westfield
There were no other sightings in Westfield on or around October 2nd 2009
